title: Slayers Volumes 1-3 Collector's Edition (Light Novel) (Volume 1)
description: The Light Novel Classic is Back in Print! Contains Volumes 1-3!Beautiful and brilliant sorcerer girls just can't have nice things, huh? All I wanted to do was swipe a little bit of bandit treasure. Now suddenly I'm being chased around by icky trolls, nasty demons, mean mummies, and brooding golem bad boys. Wait, what?! No! This sounds like work! Great, and now we've got demons stalking us and spike-shooting wolves pouring in through the windows! Guess I'll have to clean up this mess before I get my R&R... I'll show them there's a reason you don't cross Lina Inverse...
author: Hajime Kanzaka
